title: Soaring Insignia
summaries: The Soaring Insignia is a Hardmode accessory obtained from the Empress of Light's Treasure Bag that boosts the player's movement speed. It has the following effects:

• Increases acceleration by 75%, from 0.3 tiles/second² to 0.525 tiles/second², grants infinite flight time, and increases jump speed by 1.8
  • Increases movement speed by 7.5%

Additionally, it increases flight ascent speed with <linked>wings</linked> or <linked>Rocket Boots</linked>. With the Soaring Insignia equipped, the player will reach maximum movement speed much quicker, and will be able to stop, change directions and go from flying upwards to falling or vice versa very quickly.

statistics.Tooltip:
Grants infinite wing and rocket boot flight
Increases flight and jump mobility
statistics.Sell: 10
